reviews.review_msg: Attendance wasn't required, but lectures were not recorded, so if you like to re-listen to lectures, record it yourself

Great prof; fantastic lectures and a good sense of humor. She knows her content and always makes lectures interesting with examples. Her notes have most of the info you'll need and the textbook helps supplement them. Very clear voice and conveys material in an engaging way. Course is pretty content heavy, but very interesting and worth the effort.

Dr. Stanley is highly knowledgeable on the subject and it shows in her lectures. I appreciated her thorough discussion of the topics and using some very interesting examples to illustrate key concepts. She was extremely clear and very helpful. Overall a great instructor and I highly recommend her and this course.
She's a pretty good prof., the tests are focused on her lecture notes. You only need the textbook to go into more detail about what is in the lectures.
